subject: Direct Recording...anyone, yet?
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Is anyone currently recording box sessions from the box to the audio 
recorder without sending it through speaker(s) first?  

I think the (amplified) speakers add quite a bit of hiss and then a 
microphone has to pick up the bouncing sound, hiss and ambient noise - 
not as clear as direct recording a session (I would assume).

LC
http://www.AngelsGhosts.com
